lead_paragraph: Whistleblower Yulia Stepanova, who helped expose state-backed doping in Russian sports and has fled the country, asked again on Saturday for the International Olympic Committee (IOC) to reassess her exclusion from the Rio Games.

headline.print_headline: Whistleblower Stepanova Again Asks IOC to Review Her Rio Ban
headline.main: Whistleblower Stepanova Again Asks IOC to Review Her Rio Ban

snippet: Whistleblower Yulia Stepanova, who helped expose state-backed doping in Russian sports and has fled the country, asked again on Saturday for the International Olympic Committee (IOC) to reassess her exclusion from the Rio Games....
